title: India vs England Highlights, 2nd Test Day 3: Mohammed Siraj Puts India On Top Despite Jamie Smith-Harry Brook Show
description: India vs England, 2nd Test Day 3 Highlights: Mohammed Siraj shone with six wickets to his credit while Jamie Smith and Harry Brook stitched a 303-run stand.
excerpt: India vs England, 2nd Test Day 3 Highlights: Mohammed Siraj shone with six wickets to his credit while Jamie Smith and Harry Brook stitched a 303-run stand.
text: Key Events 04 Jul 2025, 22:27 PM Big feat for Jaiswal! 04 Jul 2025, 21:52 PM 6 for Siraj! ENG all out for 407 04 Jul 2025, 21:46 PM Siraj completes 5-wicket haul! 04 Jul 2025, 21:39 PM England cross 400! 04 Jul 2025, 21:06 PM Brook departs for 158 04 Jul 2025, 21:01 PM Smith, Brook complete 300-run stand 04 Jul 2025, 20:48 PM 150 for Harry Brook! 04 Jul 2025, 20:13 PM Tea, Day 3 - ENG trail IND by 232 runs 04 Jul 2025, 20:09 PM 350 up for England before Tea 04 Jul 2025, 19:31 PM Jamie Smith 150! 04 Jul 2025, 19:07 PM 300 up for England! 04 Jul 2025, 18:28 PM 9th Test century for Brook! 04 Jul 2025, 17:33 PM Lunch, Day 3 - ENG trail IND by 338 runs 04 Jul 2025, 17:30 PM 80-ball ton for Jamie Smith! 04 Jul 2025, 17:27 PM Smith misses 123-YEAR record 04 Jul 2025, 17:07 PM England cross 200! 04 Jul 2025, 16:43 PM 43-ball 50 for Smith! 04 Jul 2025, 16:38 PM 23 runs in 1 over! 04 Jul 2025, 16:33 PM 4, 6, 4 - Smith on the charge 04 Jul 2025, 16:18 PM 50 for Harry Brook! 04 Jul 2025, 15:44 PM Ben Stokes golden duck, Siraj on a hattrick! 04 Jul 2025, 15:42 PM Siraj dismisses Root early! 04 Jul 2025, 15:37 PM Akash Deep repeats errors 04 Jul 2025, 15:31 PM Play begins on Day 3 04 Jul 2025, 14:45 PM The Test so far...
